select shop_code, shop_name, shop_rep, shop_tel from shop where shop_name like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' order by shop_code

select staff_code, staff_name, staff_department from staff where staff_name like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' order by staff_code

SELECT p.process_code from process p where p.process_insert_date = (SELECT MAX(s.process_insert_date) from process s where s.process_code LIKE '${_parameter}'||'%')
